citation.case_name: United Association of Journeymen and Apprentices of the Plumbing and Pipefitting Industry, Local 38 v. Huber, Hunt & Nichols, Inc

html:
537 U.S. 942

UNITED ASSOCIATION OF JOURNEYMEN AND APPRENTICES OF THE PLUMBING AND PIPEFITTING INDUSTRY, LOCAL 38
v.
HUBER, HUNT & NICHOLS, INC.

No. 01-1790.

Supreme Court of United States.

October 7, 2002.

1

CERTIORARI TO THE UNITED STATES COURT OF APPEALS FOR THE NINTH CIRCUIT.

2

C. A. 9th Cir. Certiorari denied. JUSTICE BREYER took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition. Reported below: 282 F. 3d 746.
